name: noscriptcalc
description: A calculator webapp without client side Javascript

scripts.prod: echo 'Building!'; tsc src/index.ts; echo 'Prepare!'; ssh jonte@192.168.50.4 'cd /home/jonte/noscriptcalc; git pull; yarn'; echo 'Sending!'; scp src/index.js jonte@192.168.50.4:/home/jonte/noscriptcalc/src/index.js; echo 'Restarting NodeJS'; ssh jonte@192.168.50.4 sudo -S systemctl restart calc.service; echo 'Done!'

author: Jontes-Tech
